Lord Paramount of the Reach012632tt3byvl0ldfyrlwkdsxla0pcsk65avu1578892014-08-28T13:36:23ZSer Patrek25358400Link.[[File:Highgarden.jpg|thumb|200px|right|Highgarden, seat of the Lord Paramount of the Reach]]
'''Lord Paramount of the Reach''' is a title held by the [[Great House]] of [[the Reach]], [[House Tyrell]]. They have held the title since the death of [[Mern Gardener]] and the [[Field of Fire|extinction]] of his [[House Gardener|House]] during the [[War of Conquest]], when [[Harlen Tyrell]], the [[Steward]] of [[Highgarden]], bent the knee to Aegon the Conqueror.
